skills.name: Spinning Windcut
skills.description: [SP: 24][CD: 30s] Spins multiple times to slash nearby enemies and deal 173 Ice DMG per slash, then end with an explosive burst that deals 300% ATK of Physical DMG and slowing enemies by 60% for 1.50s. The character can freely move while spinning.

skills.name: Tailwind
skills.description: Hits against enemies have a 4.9% chance of accelerating Move Speed by 98% for 4.5s. CD: 10s.
